tidbits.title: Rainforests and Wildlife
tidbits.description: The Republic of the Congo is renowned for its lush rainforests, diverse wildlife in places like Odzala National Park, and Congo River.

tidbits.title: Cultural Diversity
tidbits.description: The country showcases cultural diversity through traditional music, art, and rituals of various ethnic groups like the Bakongo.

tidbits.title: Economic Challenges
tidbits.description: Despite natural resources, the nation faces economic challenges, striving for development amidst infrastructure and healthcare needs.
